"Argent-class cargo transports are surplus frigates overhauled for mass cargo transport."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the rear APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units current Load* (W). - Check that the front APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units' current Load* (W).
## 1.2. S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit.
- Check that the generator unit is properly anchored. - Check that the generator unit is connected to the cable terminal of your SMES via HV. - Check the fuel remaining of the generator unit. - Set the generator unit output power to 43 kW. - Enable Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 canister is anchored to the BLUE connector port. - Check that the N2 canister is anchored to the RED connector port. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (~22% Oxygen, ~78% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101.325kPa. - Enable gas mixer.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Argent-class transport ships are equipped with two APC units that can be used to appraise the ship's total power consumption. Unmodified Argent-class ship requires ~42.5 kW of power to remain operational.
